name: Mike Coletta
bio: Mike Coletta is a Seattle based comedian born in Fairbanks, Alaska. He started comedy in the wheat-infested, cultural boomtown of Pullman, WA. There, Coletta cracked up college audiences in the Nuthouse Improv Comedy Troupe, where he performed and directed. Coletta connects with audiences through his quick wit, energetic delivery, and positive presence. His honest reaction to life experiences completely envelops his comedy, and emits a fun, passionate disposition to audiences. Coletta has performed at The Bridgetown Comedy Festival, Emerald City Comicon, and Bumbershoot. Heâ€™s also the cohost of the Hug Life Podcast.
